title: Boards account says I'm level 4 when I've been level 30 since season 6
body: For some reason, I'm not able to reply in discussions because I have to have a level 13 boards profile. My account has been level 30 since season 6 and yet it says that I'm level 4. Someone, please help.

replies.body: This can happen when posting for the first time.  Looks like you're all sync'd now!
Nevermind everyone, posting this actually made my account level 30.
